data.title: Southeast Missouri State University
data.meta_description: Southeast Missouri State University is a comprehensive university offering students groundbreaking academics and personal support that launch extraordinary careers.
data.text:
The magic of SEMO is we’re a large enough school, so you’ll find the program you’re interested in, but small enough so you’ll also learn from professors who actually know you, your goals, and are invested in helping you succeed.

Most of us go to college to build the life we want, so your decision of where to go should be all about getting you to that life. Fortunately, that’s what we do best.

The scariest thing about college is that nagging question of will I find friends, will a fit in, will I be happy? Okay, maybe more than one nagging question. At SEMO, our community offers a variety of activities, teams, organizations, living spaces, dining options—each with its own unique vibe, so everyone feels at home.

Southeast is here to serve you and serve the region. We do that by being a value to students and employers while feeding the economy year after year. With nearly a $1 billion impact, Southeast helps build the regional economy and support our local businesses. By offering an affordable education, Southeast also sets students up for higher earning jobs and successful futures. Read more about all the ways Southeast is a value to the region with our most recent economic impact study.

A graduate degree is often the next step in your drive to get where you want to be. Our programs are designed to prepare you for tomorrow’s careers, achieve your goals, and master your future.

You need an online degree to fit your schedule. With Southeast Online, start when you’re ready. Get credit for what you already know. Earn a degree from an accredited institution. And, transform your future.
